name: **Avery Island – _Oileán Aimhréidh_**
description: Avery Island – Oileán Aimhréidh L738-298 Sheet 44 Lovely grassy islet. Excellent camping. Land at lovely sandy beach in NW spit. There is an exposed beach on the SW. The passage with Mason Island is reef strewn and requires care. Little Tern were probably breeding in 2008, as were Storm Petrel.
